data.title: Office of Innovation – California Cannabis Experience Survey
data.excerpt: Nearly three years ago, Proposition 64 marked the beginning of California’s three state cannabis licensing authorities: The Bureau of Cannabis Control, the California Department of Food and Agriculture and the California Department of Public Health.
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control

og_meta.site_description: Learn about California cannabis laws and licenses
